title: STOCK INDEX, GOLD, BCO & SILVER LOCO LONDON TRANSACTIONS

formula.subtitle: Notes
formula.title: Transaction Calculation Formula
formula.formula: [ ( Selling Price – Buying Price ) x Contract Size x n Lot ] – [ ( Facility Fee + VAT ) x n Lot ]
items: Contract Size (contract value): US$ 5 per point for stock index periodic rolling contracts, 100 troy ounces for Loco London gold daily rolling contracts, 5,000 troy ounces for Loco London silver daily rolling contracts, 1,000 barrels for Brent Crude Oil (BCO) periodic rolling contracts, and 100,000 for forex daily rolling spot contracts.
n Lot: n is the number of lots traded.
Facility Fee: US$ 15 per lot per side (buy or sell).
Rollover Facility: US$ 3/lot/night/side (buy or sell) for HKK; US$ 2/lot/night/side (buy or sell) for JPK; US$ 5/lot/night/side (buy or sell) for Gold, Silver, and BCO.
Total commission fee is US$ 30 for 1 lot settlement.
VAT (Value Added Tax) on Facility Fee: 11% of the commission fee, i.e. US$ 1.65/lot/side.
Total VAT is US$ 3.3 for 1 lot settlement.
If the transaction is settled more than one day (overnight), each lot will be charged an overnight/rollover fee plus 11% VAT on the overnight fee (see trading table).
rollOverFees: Rollover VAT: 11% VAT on the overnight fee.

examples.title: Example 1 (HKK5U_BBJ)
examples.description: An investor takes a position in HKK5U_BBJ at 25,000 for 2 lots (Open Buy 2 lots), expecting the price to move higher. During the day session the price rises to 25,400 and the investor liquidates all positions at 25,300 (Closed Sell 2 lots).

examples.title: Example 2 (JPK5U_BBJ)
examples.description: An investor analyzes that JPK5U_BBJ will decline and immediately takes a sell position at 49,850 for 2 lots. Two days later, the investor closes the position when the price is at 49,650.
calculation: P/L = [(Selling Price - Buying Price) x Contract Size x n Lot] - [(Fee US$30 + VAT) x n Lot]
P/L = (200 points x US$5 x 2 lots) - US$66.6
Because the trade is held overnight, an overnight (rollover) fee + VAT is charged: [(US$2 + US$0.22) x 2 lots x 2 nights] = US$8.88
Therefore net profit is: P/L = US$1,933.4 - US$8.88 = US$1,924.52
examples.result: P/L = US$1,924.52 (net profit after rollover + VAT)

examples.title: Example 3 (XULF)
examples.description: An investor predicts Loco London gold is in an uptrend and plans to take a buy position. The investor buys 2 lots at US$ 4,275.30 / troy ounce. However, the price drops to US$ 4,260.65 / troy ounce and the investor must liquidate 1 lot at US$ 4,265.30 / troy ounce. On the next day, the investor liquidates the remaining lot when the price is at US$ 4,290.20 / troy ounce.
calculation: P/L = [US$(4,265.30 - 4,275.30) / troy ounce x 100 troy ounces x 1 lot] - [US$(30 + 3.3) x 1 lot]
Because the trade is held more than 1 day, an overnight (rollover) fee + VAT is charged: [(US$5 + US$0.55) x 1 lot x 1 night] = US$5.55

examples.title: Example 4 (XAGF)
examples.description: An investor expects Loco London silver to rise, so the investor takes a buy position in XAGF at US$ 61,175 / troy ounce for 1 lot. The investor liquidates the position at US$ 61,200. The investor’s profit is:
calculation: P/L = [(US$ 24,200/troy ounce – US$ 24,175/troy ounce) x 100 troy ounce x 1 lot] – [(US$ 30 + US$ 3.3) x 1 lot]
P/L = (0.025/troy ounce x 5,000/troy ounce x 1 lot) – (US$ 33.3)
P/L = [(US$ 24,155/troy ounce – US$ 24,175/troy ounce) x 5,000 troy ounce x 1 lot] – [(US$ 30 + US$ 3.3) x 1 lot]
P/L = (-0.020/troy ounce x 5,000/troy ounce x 1 lot) – (US$ 33.3)
